Dialogue: Don't tell her I said that. Besides, you've still got the Trace on you.  And there's the wedding...
They're not Ministry.  They're Snatchers.  They hunt Muggle-borns and blood-traitors for a price.
Harry! Harry!
Riddikulus!
Couldn't do anything about that bit in the back that's always flipping up, could you? Dead annoying --
We know about the Philosopher's Stone!
Krum!!!
Don' you worry.  He'll be 'long soon 'nuff --
Seems strange, mate.  Dumbledore sends you off to find a load of Horcruxes, but doesn't bother to tell you how to destroy them. Doesn't that bother you?
Dunno.  But something tells me he didn't come to give away the bride.
You heard Ollivander. It's Harry's now.
Mary.  Go home.  Get the kids. I'll... I'll meet you there.  We have to get out the country, understand?
No. I felt weird, though. Like I'd never be cheerful again.
Because nobody asked her. I would have taken her myself if she weren't so bleeding proud.
What does he get a hug for?
Take a bit of toast, mate, go on.
Hermione, no! He's not worth it.
Uhh-um Welcome back, Hermione.
What else? I ran for it. I'm not cut out for this Harry. I don't know what got into me.
-for his discovery of the 12 uses of Dragon Blood, and his work on alchemy with his partner Nicolas Flamel!
Serves her right. She was a terrible singer.
They were after you, mate.  We'd just put everyone in danger going back.

Sorting Hat urged us all to be brave and strong in these troubled times -- easy for it to say -- it's a hat, isn't it?  First Years seemed to enjoy it, though. Wankers. Filch give you the wand outside?
He saved your life.
No, you don't understand -- Oh, bloody hell...
Dumbledore?  And me?  I dunno. I reckon I was just another Weasley to him.  He was always polite --
Of course. You heard him! 'You'll be next Mudbloods,'
C'mon.  Mum's got dinner ready.
Hermione of course. Come on Harry, why'd you think she wouldn't tell us who she's coming with?
Expellliarmus!
Her skeleton will lie in the chamber forever.' Ginny
But I'm your brother!
Look at your tail!
Ancient Runes? Exactly how many classes are you taking?
So...no giants are coming?
Moaning Myrtle.
Really?  Strapping guy like you, you've got a Beater's build, don't you think?  Keeper needs to be agile, quick --
Probably Neville forgotten the password again.
Follow the spiders! Follow the spiders! If Hagrid ever gets out of Azkaban, I'll kill him! I mean, what was the point of sending us in there? What have we found out?
Well, you fell off your broom.
What do you suppose Dean sees in her?  Ginny.
I smell like my great aunt Tessie. Murder me Harry.
Scabbers, you bit me!
How will we know what it is when we get in there? After all, a Horcrux can be anything.
Let's think. Who do we know who thinks all Muggle-borns are scum?
What are we gonna do? We can't leave Hermione alone with her.
But why the Department of Mysteries?
Shove off, Malfoy.
Been looking for you for ages. Thought we lost you.
I could feel it inside me.  It was warm, like the first sip of a good cup of tea.  And I knew it would take me where I needed to go.
That's me! Only, I'm head boy...and I'm holding the Quidditch cup! And bloody hell, I'm Quidditch Captain too! I look good. Harry, do you think this mirror shows the future?
Spiders! There's... There's spiders. Spiders. They want me to tap-dance. I don't wanna tap-dance!
Fine.  I get it.  I saw you two the other night.  Yeah, that's right.  Didn't know I knew, did you?
And to think I've been worrying about my Potions final.
Uh Harry?
A hundred and fifty.  Give or take a few years.
Alohomora?
Ginny these must be for you.
So I took this and I clicked it and this tiny ball of light appeared.  And I knew.
Scar...?
Listen to the idiot. He's really laying it on thick, isn't he?
Kill us faster?! Oh, now I can relax!
Whose hair are you ripping out then?
He's gone. The snake too.
It's obvious, isn't it? We've got to play our way across the room. All right. Harry, you take the Bishop's square. Hermione, you'll be the Queen's side castle. As for me, I'll be a knight.
So.  Did you and Ginny do it?
Hermione, no! He's not worth it.
Excuse me, do you mind? Everywhere else is full.
They mean every flavour! There's chocolate and peppermint, and there's also spinach, liver and tripe. George sweared he got a bogey-flavoured one once!
Hermione's got nice skin. Wouldn't you say?  As skin goes, I mean.
That's insulting! It's as if they don't trust us!  Dumbledore again!
Packet of drewbals and a liquorice wand.
Leg-Locker Curse?
But if it kills by looking people in the eye, why is it no one's dead?
Snogging?  Who're you talking about?
I gotta tell you, I'm starting to freak out a bit.
We've got to get off the streets, get somewhere safe.
The sword was stolen.
Hey.  Where's Hermione?
Fred gave me a spell as to turn him yellow. Want to see?
Exactly! Now the whole school's gonna think you're his great- greatgreat grandson, or something.
He's my rat, sir. He's not really a rat. He was a rat. He was my brother Percy's rat. But then they gave him an owl...
Bloody bird's a menace. Oh, no!
Mum fancies him.
It's Levioooosa, not Leviosaaaar.  She's a nightmare, honestly. No wonder she hasn't got any friends!
Hermione! Bad idea. Bad idea.
Six months she hasn't seen me and it's like I'm Frankie First Year. I mean, I'm only her brother.
I don't like spiders What's that?
Yeah, and we're about as near getting rid of it as we are to finding the rest of them, aren't we!
Bloody hell. We/'ll never find him on this.
You said she was making you do lines!
Harry, you've seen the way that bloodthirsty beast of hers... is always lurking about. And Scabbers is gone.
The world's mental.  Come on, drink up.  We've got a Horcrux to find.
Jinxing the broom? What do we do?
I'm fine!
Not exactly leaving the place better than we found it, are we?
So I Disapparated and came out on this hillside.  It was dark.  I didn't have any idea where I was. I just had to hope one of you would show yourselves in the end. And you did.
Ahem. Vera verto!
Luna?
I'm resigning.  After today's match.  McLaggen can have my spot.
Harry wake up! Come on Harry, wake up!
Sure. Except no one's ever broken out of Azkaban before... and he's a murderous, raving lunatic.
Let me get this straight. Sirius Black has escaped from Azkaban to come after you?
You're a Parselmouth? Why didn't you tell us?
Shell Cottage on the outskirts of Tinworth. Trust me.
We've only seen him twice, and not for very long. He's really busy.
Oh, don't try one of them. Oh, no. Look at him. His face.
Rescuing you, of course. Now, come on. Get your trunk!
Thank you Nigel.
This is mad. At this rate we'll be the only ones in our year without dates.
Come on, Harry! Hurry up!
He bit me! Scabbers!
The flying gear's jammed!
Quiet. Let the man through. I didn't mean to open it, Harry. It was badly wrapped. They made me do it.
You understand right, Harry. Once I make my move, the Queen will take me...then you'll be free to check the King.
Traditional?? They're ancient! I look like my great aunt Tessie.
Fred and George are on the team, too. Beaters.
Hermione!
Right. So let's do it.  Who gets who?
Loads according to Dad, that's what worried them so much. Happened right under their noses.
Weasley... Barney Weasley.
Do you think she knows I exist?
I feel really... bad.
We don't even know this Tom Riddle. He sounds like a dirty, rotten snitch to me.
Do you think it'd be all right if we had some of this?
Well, you can't expect him to hang around all day, can you?  This is Scabbers, by the way, pathetic, isn't he?
Ron Weasley, sir.  But I'm dead awful at Potions, a menace actually, so I probably should just be going --
I've always liked it.  These flames Hermione makes.
We thought you'd gone to the forest, we thought you might be --
There isn't a witch or wizard who went bad who wasn't in Slytherin.
What if he were still on his...
I know you! You're Nearly Headless Nick!
Lav, c'mon. Of course I'll wear it.
Scabbers! You're alive!
How long you reckon she'll stay mad at me?
You don't say.  Just out of interest... is there any other way out of here?
All right, I'll spit it out. Don't expect me to skip up and down because now there's some other damn thing we've got to find.
Honestly, Professor Snape, I think it did more damage to us.
That'll be a cheerful visit! Hello, Hagrid! Tell us, have you been setting anything mad and hairy loose in the castle lately?â
Never mind. Doesn't matter. You could have let your best friend know though.
It's been trained to expect pain when it hears the noise.
Aren't you the one who keeps telling everyone it's their first duty to help Harry?
Suppose it's him that did Mad-Eye. How would you feel then?
I know what that is. That's an invisibility cloak.
Something's about to burst out of Hilary but I don't think it's a swan.
Who ever it was, they must have been looking for something.
I knew Ginny was lying about that tattoo.
No, I... I did think maybe I saw something -- when I was running -- over there --
That was wicked, Harry!
Dad works in the Ministry of Magic, in the Misuse of Muggle Artifacts Office. Dad loves Muggles, thinks they're fascinating.
Fred reckons people need a laugh these days.
Come on. It's one thing for a bloke to show up alone. For a girl it's just sad.
Maybe it's because of the Horcruxes. Maybe he's growing weaker. Maybe he's dying.
Lockhart's memory charm backfired. He hasn't got a clue who he is!
She's gone mental, Hermione has. I mean, not that she wasn't always mental... but now it's in the open for everyone to see.
But, it can't hurt if someone throws something at you. I mean, it'll just go right through you.
Did you get a look at him! Fora second I thought it was --
Alohomora!  Well, it was worth a try.
Check.
Stupify!
No, we'd NOT care to join you and Viktor.
Imperio!
No.  He's worried he should have got more money for it.
Pipes? It's using the plumbing!
What happens when he finds out four are gone?
What are you trying to do to him? Scabbers! Leave him alone! Get off him! What are you doing?
Harry, I know what you're thinking, but don't. There's something not quite right about that mirror.
Won't he know he's being hunted?
Harry, where is she?
I'll be right back.  Want to play chess?
Scabbers, come back!
Come off it, Hagrid! We're not blind!
Hermione!!
Finite Incantatem, okay.  And if that doesn't work...?
You're supposed to stroke it.
Yeah it is isn't it. Suppose I was a bit distraught.
Still no luck with Slughorn, I take it?
Barking.  Does he not remember that raving arachnid tried to eat us? What?
She could never annoy me.  I think... I think I love her.
Whew. Lucky we didn't panic!
It's just, well, you can't break an Unbreakable Vow.
We go and visit Hagrid?
I'm going to resign.
So you're saying this weapon You- Know-Who's after is in the Department of Mysteries?
Harry!
Is it just me?  Or do Draco and mummy look like two people who don't want to be followed?
Just the drewbals, thanks.
Harry! I tried out for Quidditch Keeper at the tryouts! I'm on the team!
It's angry.
Foul little git. Least we've got Bogrod.
Harry, she's swallowing her tongue --
Oh no! The Invisibility Booster must be faulty!
There's no one like Krum. He's like a bird the way he rides the wind. He's more than an athlete, he's an artist.
Not bloody likely.  He's top of the class.  Even better than you, Hermione.  Slughorn thinks he's a genius.
Spider?  About six feet tall?  Ten feet wide?
Now I'm really depressed.
You're a little scary sometimes...you know that? Brilliant, but scary.
Whoa. Harry, you never told me your father was a Seeker, too.
Shut your mouth, Malfoy.
Mind you, I mean, we did save her life.
Brilliant. Loads of old stuff... like mummies, tombs, even Scabbers enjoyed himself.
Change of plans, my parents decided to go to Romania to visit my brother Charlie. He's studying dragons there.
What do they think they're doing?? Keeping a thing like that locked up in a school.
That's wizard's chess.  I see you've packed.
You have got to start standing up to people, Neville.
Well, let's see then, put it on.
Castle to E-4! Smash! Ron: Pawn to C-3! Smash! Boom! The Queen turns, and smashes a piece! Harry, Ron and Hermione wince. The Queen turns again. Both Ron and Harry study the game.
You mean he could see you?
A cat? Is that what they told you? Looks more like a pig with hair.
Of course. Don't you see? Lucius Malfoy must have opened it when he was at school here. And now he's taught Draco how to do it.
Mum sort of lost it last week. Said Ginny and I had no business going back to Hogwarts.  That it's too dangerous.
Seeker? But first years never make their house teams! You must be the youngest Quidditch player in...
He's a Durmstrang. You're fraternising with the enemy.
I wasn't looking at its feet! I was a bit preoccupied with its heads. Or maybe you didn't notice, there were three!
But how's a basilisk been getting around? A dirty great snake- someone would have seen it.
Who's Moaning Myrtle?
What if he's still on his mission from Dumbledore?
Happy Christmas, Harry.
I expect you'll be going with McLaggen.  Isn't he a member of the Slug Club?
There she was walking by. You know I like it when they walk. I couldn't help it, it just sort of slipped out.
Dress robes? for what?
Scabbers has been in my family for...
Honeyduke's Sweetshop is brilliant, but nothing beats Zonko's Joke Shop. We never did got a chance to go to the Shrieking Shack though. You heard it's the most...
What are friends for?
Where's Romilda?
So painful. They might chop it.
Werewolves?
Well, you sort of went rigid. We thought maybe you were having a fit or something.
Those are Nimbus Two Thousand and Ones! How did you get those?
Look inside him, Harry.
At least I warned you about the dragons.
Sure. Along with his Invisibility Cloak.
. Green. That's a monkey. What is that? You call that a monkey? Do not give him one again. Hey, Neville, try an elephant.
Along with the dung beetle.
"The Hog's Head," Hermione?
Well, my dad did tell me about one... The imperious curse.
To the Shrieking Shack?
And if we find one? How're we supposed to destroy it if we've given Griphook the sword?
Sorry, Harry.  Looks like it's Hermione and me this time.
You reckon she's here to spy on us?
This is no graveyard.  It's a chessboard.
Harry, I don't like this Harry, I don't like this at all!
Dean?  He's brilliant.
Believe me, Professor, I've been asking myself the same question for six years.
Blimey Harry, you slayed dragons. If you can't get a date who can?
What's with the birds?
Poor kid, bet she's alone in her room crying her eyes out.
She needs to sort out her priorities!
Well, us and Neville!
There's something moving out there. I think... someone's coming aboard.
So what do we do with you, huh? Kill us if it was turned round, wouldn't you?
Right.  Antlers.
All she wants to do is snog me. My lips are getting chapped. Look.
Harry! Hold on! Take my hand! Hold on!
There's something else you should know too. When you fell, your broom sort of blew into the Whomping Willow, and... Well...
What I'm saying is, if we do this thing right, if we find the Horcruxes and begin to destroy them one by one...
We wanted to, mate, we really did, but he thought they would get intercepted. There is an awkward silence.
You're the best with spells.
Brilliant isn't he! Completely demented of course. Terrifying to be in the same room with, he's really BEEN there you know.
Blimey even when you go wrong it turns out right.

Oh, yeah. Um... Well, Harry's got sort of a wonky cross. That's trials and suffering. And that there could be the sun and that's happiness. So... you're gonna suffer, but you're gonna be... happy about it.
They're headed to the Dark Forest! Why spiders! Why couldn't it be follow the butterflies?â
Not to mention you dueled with You- Know-Who all alone and he still couldn't kill you!
Piss off!  Arthur Weasley's ten times the wizard you are!
Do you think we'll ever just have a quiet year at Hogwarts?
You're barking.  What would You- Know-Who want with a sod like Malfoy?
They're really rare.  I wonder who gave it to you?
C'mon, Harry.  We've got a game to win.

Look, I can't help it if she's got her knickers in a twist.  What Lav and I have -- well, let's just say there was no stopping it.  It's chemical.  Will it last?  Who knows?  Point is, I'm a free agent.
Harry!
I told him I'd get him Harry's autograph. Oh look mum's sent me something. Mum sent me a dress??
Whew, we made it. Can you imagine the look on McGonagall's face if we were late?
Bill and Fleur.  Mum's been planning it for months.  Only thing that's kept her sane, I reckon.  She'll kill me if I miss it.  Kill you too.  Rather go face to face with You-Know-Who if I'm honest.
Lumos !
Bloody hell, Harry. That was not funny.
You're the Defense Against the Dark Arts teacher! You can't go now!
I heard you speaking Parseltongue. Snake language?
It's crazy. And worse, Malfoy knows.
Unless of course you've been ripped to pieces!
I overheard a bloke from the Enforcement office talking about it at the Ministry.  Blimey, what's that smell?
It's not much, but it's home.
How do I look?
You're supposed to say the Cloak, but who wants to spend all day being invisible.  Dead boring if you ask me.  But an unbeatable wand!
Wingardrium Leviosar!

The two clinging to the tree are Death Eaters for sure.  Dunno 'bout the bloke on the bench. Can't see us, of course.  But we'll have to be careful coming and going.  C'mon.  There's something else you need to see.
Hello, darling.  Fancy a drink?
Trevor shh! Go, you shouldn't be here!
I think Hermione's right.  I think we ought to go and see Lovegood. What say we vote on it?  Those in favor...
I think I'm gonna be sick!
It's a creepy shop.  He's a creepy bloke.
Not bloody likely.  Smells like something Ginny would cook.
You there! D-5!  Yes, Hermione, I think this is going to be exactly like wizard's chess!
Come on, Hermione!
Has a bit of a thing for you, Hermione.  Cormac.
You're asking us? You're the brilliant one.
Oh, c'mon!  Beedle's stories are famous!  Babbity Rabbitty? No...?
Midnight.  Mum always said midnight. But twilight's fine.  Better actually.
Harry, what do we do? Harry...?
Piece of advice.  Let's not rehash old times.  Got it... mate?
